name: Dandelion's Hello!
description: Weeds: Unloved, unseen, stepped upon, torn up and destroyed.  In spite of all that's done to eradicate them they are still here.  They are survivors.  Look closely and you will see beauty.  First of eleven in the series "In the Weeds".  Original photograph, altered and animated using Procreate.  2400 x 3200 px gif.
